original_text: Jeremiah started to leave the city to go to the territory of Benjamin to get his share of the property among the people there.
korean_text: 예레미야가 베냐민 땅에서 백성 가운데 분깃을 받으려고 예루살렘을 떠나 그리로 가려 하여

sentences.original_text: Jeremiah started to leave the city
to go to the territory of Benjamin
to get his share of the property
